title: What do you think would have happened to grunge and rock music if Andy Wood was able to stay in the industry longer? - Quora

response.answer_text: Interesting question. I can only speculate, but I think that the grunge bands would have still achieved success at roughly the same time that they did in real life. The only difference may have been that Mother Love Bone, playing their great stadium-sized glam-rock, would already have been a huge group by that stage. Also, Pearl Jam may not have existed as a consequence. And, ironically, perhaps, MLB would have been one of the bands to suffer as a consequence of Nirvana’s success, as some of the other glam-metal bands did.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Jan Patrick Pagtalunan

response.answer_text: There would be no Pearl Jam (not that I care much about it…) and the world would have never heard that Temple of the Dog gem.
